NetCDFNoSuchVariableException - Exception in nl.esciencecenter.esight.exceptions
An exception that is generated when a variable was asked for by name (string) that didn't exist in the NetCDF file.
NetCDFNoSuchVariableException(String) - Constructor for exception nl.esciencecenter.esight.exceptions.NetCDFNoSuchVariableException
 
NetCDFUtil - Class in nl.esciencecenter.esight.io.netcdf
Stand-alone class that facilitates reading from NetCDF files and getting some information from collections of such files.
NetCDFUtil() - Constructor for class nl.esciencecenter.esight.io.netcdf.NetCDFUtil
 
NewNoise - Class in nl.esciencecenter.esight.noise
Currently unused class, stored for reference.
NewNoise() - Constructor for class nl.esciencecenter.esight.noise.NewNoise
 
nl.esciencecenter.esight.datastructures - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.datastructures
Contains the more complex datastructures needed for the operation of the eSight library.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.examples - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.examples
This package contains an annotated and as-complete-as-possible example implementation for the eSight Library.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.exceptions - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.exceptions
Contains all possible exceptions of the eSight library.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.experimental - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.experimental
This package is more of a storage area for currently unused classes that are highly experimental and probably buggy.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.input - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.input
The user-input centered classes of the library.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.io.netcdf - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.io.netcdf
The NetCDF-library-adaptation wrapper classes, for easy access and retrieval of meta-data from directories full of NetCDF files.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.noise - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.noise
Noise-generation related functionality, like Perlin noise for heightmap textures.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.scenegraph - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.scenegraph
Scenegraph functionality implementation, including an octree datastructure.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.shaders - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.shaders
GLSL Shader wrapper packages for Object-Oriented shader-enabled programming.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.swing - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.swing
Contains extra Java Swing functionality and ease-of-use for user interfaces.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.text - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.text
Package containing the classes needed to implement 3d and 2d text in jogl.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.text.jogampExperimental - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.text.jogampExperimental
Some poorly-annotated code generated by the JogAmp community for text rendering in JOGL.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.textures
The packages needed for texturing objects in the world.
nl.esciencecenter.esight.util - package nl.esciencecenter.esight.util
Utility classes for the eSight library, like a Settings file reader implementation.
noise(double, double, double) - Static method in class nl.esciencecenter.esight.noise.ImprovedPerlinNoise
 
Noise - Class in nl.esciencecenter.esight.noise
Noise creation class for visual effects.
